tasksList.moduleSwitcher.generator:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for the 'Generator' task module
**UI Location**: Task list → Module filter → Module options
**When Users See This**: When opening the module filter dropdown in the task list
**Technical Context**: Represents the 'generator' module type
**Current English**: "Generator"
tasksList.moduleSwitcher.learningExercis:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for the 'Learning Exercise' task module
**UI Location**: Task list → Module filter → Module options
**When Users See This**: When opening the module filter dropdown in the task list
**Technical Context**: Represents the 'concept-exercise' module type
**Current English**: "Learning Exercise"

**Technical Context**: Represents the 'analyzer' module type
**Current English**: "Analyzer"
tasksList.moduleSwitcher.multiple:
**Functional Purpose**: Indicates that multiple module options are currently selected
**UI Location**: Task list → Module filter (selected value display)
**When Users See This**: When the module filter has more than one module selected
**Technical Context**: Placeholder for selected modules display
**Current English**: "Multiple"
tasksList.moduleSwitcher.allModules:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating all modules are selected or the filter is reset
**UI Location**: Task list → Module filter (selected value display / reset component)
**When Users See This**: When no specific module filter is applied, showing all tasks
**Technical Context**: Used as a default or reset state for the module filter
**Current English**: "All"
sizeTag.xs:
**Functional Purpose**: Abbreviated label for 'tiny' task size
**UI Location**: Task list → Task card → Size tag
**When Users See This**: On task cards with 'tiny' size
**Technical Context**: Short label for task size 'tiny'
**Current English**: "xs"

**Functional Purpose**: Abbreviated label for 'small' task size
**UI Location**: Task list → Task card → Size tag
**When Users See This**: On task cards with 'small' size
**Technical Context**: Short label for task size 'small'
